title: Is Israel using food deprivation as a war tactic?
description: Israel's assault on Gaza has left hundreds of thousands of Palestinian residents facing catastrophic food insecurity.

title: UNRWA facility under Israeli attack in Khan Younis
description: UNRWA tells Al Jazeera hundreds of people sheltering at its facility have come under Israeli fire

title: Turkey, Iran agree on need for regional stability amid Israel’s war on Gaza
description: Gaza war topped the agenda as Turkey's Recep Tayyip Erdogan and Iran's Ebrahim Raisi met in Ankara.

title: Will a US court order Biden to stop ‘complicity’ in Gaza genocide?
description: Lawsuit asks court to order President Joe Biden to end US assistance to Israel that enables alleged genocide in Gaza.

title: ICJ to decide on emergency measures in Israel-Gaza genocide case this week
description: The World Court will decide whether to order emergency measures relating to Israel's military action in Gaza.

title: Hundreds flee further south as Israeli forces advance in Khan Younis
description: The southern city was deemed 'safe' for hundreds of thousands of Palestinians who fled north and central Gaza.

title: Several killed in Israeli attack on UN shelter housing 800 in southern Gaza
description: UNRWA official fears 'mass casualties' after Israeli tank shelling on one of its facilities in Khan Younis.

title: Humanitarian aid for Gaza blocked by protests
description: A crowd of Israelis gathered to stop aid trucks from entering Gaza at the Karam Abu Salem border crossing.

title: People run for their lives from Khan Younis in Gaza
description: Palestinians are fleeing Khan Younis in south Gaza where Israeli forces say they have encircled the city.

title: How Israel has destroyed Gaza’s schools and universities
description: All schools in Gaza have been shut and no university has survived Israel military's more than 100 days of onslaught.
